programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: The Jelly Roger; The Farmyard Feline Philosopher; Dogmother 2
programme.desc: A pirate steals food; the fairy dogmother grants wishes Garfield, Odie and Jon.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: Alley Katta & the 40 Thieves; If It's Tuesday, This Must Be Alpha Centauri; Clash of Titans
programme.desc: Garfield's version of the 40 thieves; Garfield is in an X-Men spoof.

programme.sub-title: Canned Laughter; Déjà Vu; The Man Who Hated Cats
programme.desc: Jon builds his own robot; a cat-hating old man reunites with his childhood pet.

programme.sub-title: Horror Hostess, Pt. 1; Newsworthy Wade; Horror Hostess, Pt. 2

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: Arbuckle The Invincible; The Monster Who Couldn't Scare Anybody; The Ocean Blue
programme.desc: A spaceship's force field makes Jon invicible; a beach vacation.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: Peace and Quiet; Wanted: Wade; Garfield Goes Hawaiian
programme.desc: Binky shows up and disturbs Garfield's rest; Garfield catches the Hawaiian cat flu and dances the hula whenever someone mentions anything from Hawaii.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: Jon the Barbarian; Uncle Roy to the Rescue; The Kitten Council
programme.desc: A cartoonist wins the hand of a maiden; Jon's niece Chloe is captured by the Weasel; the council calls upon Nermal.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: Next Door Nuisance; What's it All About Wade; Bigfeetz
programme.desc: Mr. Burnside rents his house to a singer; a professor tries to cure Wade; Jon wants a picture of Bigfeetz to win a reward.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: The Canine Conspiracy; Snow Wade and the 77 Dwarfs: Part 1; The Genuine Article
programme.desc: The Garfield Crime Files examines the cast of the "Purse-Snatching Pooches"; Orson starts reading the classic tail of "Snow White"; Garfield discovers Gabriel the cat lives in the same city.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: The Best Policy; Snow Wade and the 77 Dwarfs Part Two; Fishy Feline
programme.desc: Jon gets into a car accident; Orson finishes the tale of Snow White; Garfield has a dream where he's a fish.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: The Pie-Eyed Piper; Fine Feathered Funny-Man; Sweet Tweet Treat
programme.desc: The story of the pied piper with a twist; Garfield feels guilty about eating a bird.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: The Floyd Story; How Now, Stolen Cow?; Second Penelope Episode
programme.desc: Aunt Prunella is the guest at the show; Roy plants evidence of a robbery; Garfield must dodge a catcher while on a date.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Mouse; Payday Mayday; How to Drive Humans
programme.desc: Garfield uses a mouse to tell the story of Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde; Garfield teaches kittens how to people crazy.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: Date of Disaster; A Little Time Off; The Longest Doze
programme.desc: Jon is humiliated on a game show; the gang tries to take Lanolin on vacation; Garfield tries to break a world record.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: Stairway to Stardom; Return of the Incredibly Stupid Swamp Monster; The Life and Times of the Lasagna Kid
programme.desc: After falling asleep while playing a board game, Jon dreams he and Garfield are in it; Orson and Roy read the famous poem of Paul Revere; Jon decides to buy a vacation home in the mountains.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: Magic, Monsters and Manicotti; U.S Acres: The Midnight Ride of Paul Revere's Duck; Unreal Estate
programme.desc: Garfield tells Odie about the stage team of Jackie and his cat, Buddy; Garfield answers the phone; the scientist tries to get his robot back; Garfield sings a ballad about a famous Western cat.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: Lost and Foundling; Winter Wonderland; Films and Felines
programme.desc: A little girl finds Odie while he is playing hide and seek; cats in films.

programme.desc: Jon takes a girl to a game show; the acres crew convinces congress to create holidays; Jon talks at a prison.

programme.sub-title: Nighty-Nightmare/Wade Garden/de to Odie
programme.desc: The lazy cat has fun with his friends.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: Fraidy Cat; Shell-Shocked Sheldon; Nothing to Sneeze at
programme.desc: Garfield watches a horror movie alone when the lights go out; Jon asks Liz out on a date while Garfield has an allergy attack.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: Garfield's Moving Experience; Wade: You're Afraid; Good Mousekeeping
programme.desc: Garfield decides to find a new home with a wealthy family; Floyd the mouse realizes that Garfield doesn't chase mice and invites his entire family to Jon's house.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: Identity Crisis, Bad Sport; Up a Tree
programme.desc: Garfield exchanges animal sounds with a dog on the run from the dog catcher; Garfield is jealous of the attention given to Nermal so he climbs up a tree.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: Weighty Problem; The Worm Turns; Good Cat, Bad Cat
programme.desc: Jon goes on a strict diet after Garfield tampers with a new scale; Garfield's good and evil sides battle after Jon tells him to leave the mailman alone.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: Cabin Fever; Return of Power Pig; Fair Exchange
programme.desc: Jon, Garfield and Odie take a winter vacation in a cabin; Garfield and Jon both dream that they switch bodies after arguing about who has the easier life.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: The Binky Show; Keeping Cool; Don't Move
programme.desc: Garfield goes on a TV game show to win money to buy Jon a birthday present; Odie gets caught by the dog catcher after Garfield tells him not to move.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: Magic Mutt; Short Story; Monday Misery
programme.desc: Jon is asked to perform a magic show at a children's hospital; to avoid Monday, Garfield mails himself to Samoa.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: Best of Breed; National Tapioca Pudding Day; All About Odie
programme.desc: Garfield enters a cat talent show; Garfield produces a documentary film about Odie.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: Caped Avenger; Shy Fly Guy; Green Thumbs Down
programme.desc: Garfield's alter ego searches for missing Pooky; Jon decides he should grow his own food in a garden after seeing their high grocery bills.

programme.title: Garfield and Friends
programme.sub-title: Garfield's Forget-Me-Not; I Like Having You Around; Sales Resistance
programme.desc: Garfield suffers amnesia after being hit in the head with a pie tin; Garfield battles a pesky salesman.

programme.sub-title: Pest of a Guest; Impractical Joker; Fat and Furry
